name: Red Hot Ricochet
description: It's high noon in this barren wasteland, and only one of you is making it out alive. Sure, you could try and shoot them right between the eyes - but where's the fun in that? Red Hot Ricochet is an intense game of ricochet duels, and you'll need wise shooting, lucky bounces, and a bit of triggernometry to win.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or higher Storage: 200 MB available space
